app.name: AmaruID
app.description: Digital identity and reputation system built on Stellar blockchain

home.hero_subtitle: Identity and reputation system built on Stellar blockchain, designed to work without constant internet connectivity
home.feature_identity_desc: The community creates a multisig wallet representing the community assembly
home.feature_offline_desc: Identities are generated without internet and synced when connectivity is available
home.feature_certification_desc: The assembly certifies its members through the COMMCERT asset
home.feature_reputation_desc: Environmental actions translate into quantifiable reputation (MVRS)
home.feature_conservation_desc: Register environmental activities with verifiable evidence on blockchain
home.feature_verification_desc: Anyone can verify identity and reputation on Stellar Explorer
home.stats_subtitle: Data that lives on the blockchain, not in a corporate database
home.stat_trees_detail: Reforestation actions registered and verified on blockchain
home.stat_communities_detail: Indigenous communities using sovereign digital identity
home.stat_offline_detail: Works without connection with automatic sync when online
home.stat_ecosystems_detail: From the Napo basin to the heights of Pastaza
home.story_subtitle: The story of how Amazonian worldview meets blockchain technology
home.story1_quote: In the Amazonian worldview, the Amaru is the cosmic serpent that connects the worlds.
home.story1_body: AmaruID takes this name because it connects identities with the blockchain, weaving a bridge between the ancestral and the digital.
home.story2_body: The community assembly, represented by a multisig wallet on Stellar, is the one that certifies each member. Real sovereignty.
home.story3_body: Every conservation action is recorded immutably on Stellar and builds reputation verifiable by anyone.
home.story4_body: A transparent score based on verified actions, community endorsements, and active time. No opaque algorithms.
home.features_subtitle: Built for real communities, not for demos
home.arch_subtitle: Complete digital identity flow on Stellar Testnet
home.arch2_detail: Own keypair stored offline with Dexie.js
home.cta_subtitle: Start by setting up your community on Stellar Testnet. No costs, no permissions, no intermediaries.
